snippet: Kobe Bryant expressed only mild frustration after Wednesday’s official announcement of the long-expected decision to shut him down for the year.
abstract: Los Angeles Lakers announce that shooting guard Kobe Bryant will sit out remainder of season; broken bone in his left knee has not yet healed enough for weight-bearing exercise.
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant expressed only mild frustration after Wednesday’s official announcement of the long-expected decision to shut him down for the year.
